statements: SELECT * FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE order_type = 'BUY';
SELECT order_id, trader_name FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, trader_name, order_amount FROM arbitrage_orders ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(order_amount) AS average_order_amount FROM arbitrage_orders;
SELECT trader_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM arbitrage_orders GROUP BY trader_name HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE order_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, trader_name, order_amount FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY trader_name ASC;
SELECT trader_name, SUM(order_amount) AS total_amount FROM arbitrage_orders GROUP BY trader_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT trader_name, order_amount, DAY(order_timestamp) AS order_day FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE MONTH(order_timestamp) = 10 ORDER BY order_day;
SELECT trader_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM arbitrage_orders WHERE YEAR(order_timestamp) = 2021 GROUP BY trader_name ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT order_id, stock_symbol, quantity FROM buy_orders;
SELECT trader_id, price FROM sell_orders WHERE trader_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM sell_orders;
SELECT trader_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM buy_orders GROUP BY trader_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, trader_id, stock_symbol FROM sell_orders WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT trader_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM buy_orders GROUP BY trader_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT trader_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sell_orders GROUP BY trader_id HAVING AVG(price) > 75;
SELECT trader_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM buy_orders GROUP BY trader_id HAVING num_orders >= 3 ORDER BY num_orders DESC, trader_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name, trader_type FROM traders;
SELECT trader_name, trader_type FROM traders WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trader_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sell_orders GROUP BY trader_id;
SELECT * FROM traders WHERE trader_type = 'Individual';
SELECT trader_id, trader_name FROM traders WHERE trader_type = 'Institutional' ORDER BY trader_name DESC;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name, trader_type FROM traders WHERE trader_id IN (SELECT trader_id FROM buy_orders);
SELECT trader_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM buy_orders GROUP BY trader_id HAVING num_orders > 3;
SELECT trader_name, stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM traders JOIN sell_orders ON traders.trader_id = sell_orders.trader_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name FROM traders;
SELECT stock_symbol, buy_price, buy_quantity FROM buy_orders WHERE buy_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM sell_orders ORDER BY sell_price DESC;
SELECT traders.trader_name, buy_orders.stock_symbol, buy_orders.buy_quantity FROM traders JOIN buy_orders ON traders.trader_id = buy_orders.trader_id;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE buy_price > 100 ORDER BY buy_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name FROM traders WHERE trader_type = 'Individual' AND trader_name LIKE '%John%' OR trader_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT stock_symbol, sum(buy_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM buy_orders GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT t.trader_name, a.profit FROM traders t JOIN arbitrage_opportunities a ON t.trader_id = a.buy_order_id ORDER BY a.profit DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT buy_order_id, sell_order_id, profit FROM arbitrage_opportunities WHERE profit > 5000 AND buy_order_id = 1001 OR sell_order_id = 2002 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders LIMIT 5;
SELECT trader_id, stock_symbol, quantity FROM sell_orders WHERE price > 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM traders ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT trader_id FROM buy_orders;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM traders WHERE trader_id = 1001;
SELECT trader_id, COUNT(*) FROM buy_orders GROUP BY trader_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT buy.stock_symbol, SUM(buy.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(sell.price) AS avg_price FROM buy_orders buy JOIN sell_orders sell ON buy.stock_symbol = sell.stock_symbol GROUP BY buy.stock_symbol;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, description FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
